remarks: Commute two explicit substitutions, using an implicit substitution to rewrite the exiting substitution.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
sbccomieg.1 $e |- ( a = A -> B = C ) $.
sbccomieg $p |- ( [. A / a ]. [. B / b ]. ph <-> [. C / b ]. [. A / a ]. ph ) $.
$d A a $.
$d A a b $.
$d C a $.
